# apagee

Apagee is a self-hosted, minimalistic, fediverse-first, solo blog engine.

## Features

* Single-user
* Quick and easy setup
* Cross-platform (Windows or Linux)
* Reverse proxy support
* Full fediverse participation
* Admin web interface
